Adapted from Agency Theme on Bootstrap

A little goes a long way!

Working at the jumps can be daunting, especially if you don't have much experience. The good news is that almost anyone can sweep, and it helps out the park a bunch.

How to sweep:

  • Step 1: Connect the hose to the pump
  • Step 2: Turn on the hose and wet the jump just enough to cover. (If you see water running down the jump- it's too much! A little goes a long way.)
  • Step 3: Grab a broom and sweep dry sand and dirt into the wetted areas. The finer the sand/dirt the better! Try to avoid chuncky dirt and rocks.
  • Step 4: Final sweep- sweep off remaining loose soil.
  • Step 5: Lightly water the jump one more time.
  • Step 6: RIDE YOUR BIKE!
